references.citationString: Arriga, N., Dell'Acqua, A., Matteucci, M., ICOS RI, 2021. ICOS ETC Eddy Flux Raw ASCII daily archive, San Rossore 2, 2021-06-12, https://hdl.handle.net/11676/jOwHNn7vu5ZpHmM5fRjt5cYN

comments: The site San Rossore 2, with ICOS code IT-SR2, is located inside the Parco Regionale Migliarino, San Rossore, Massaciuccoli approximately 8 Km west of Pisa. The ecosystem under investigation is a very homogeneous and dense stand of Pinus pinea L., in addition only scarce occurrences of Quercus ilex L., Fraxinus excelsior L. and Alnus glutinosa (L.)Gaertn.
self.label: IT-SR2

documentation.name: IT-SR2 ICOS Ecosystem Station Labelling Report.pdf

comments: Lands dominated by woody vegetation with a percent cover >60% and height exceeding 2 meters. Almost all trees remain green all year. Canopy is never without green foliage.
ecosystemType.label: Evergreen Needleleaf Forests

format.label: Multi-file zip archive with ETC raw time series

self.label: ICOS ETC Eddy Flux Raw ASCII daily archive

comments: The site San Rossore 2, with ICOS code IT-SR2, is located inside the Parco Regionale Migliarino, San Rossore, Massaciuccoli approximately 8 Km west of Pisa.
